III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
The agency is being moved back to the residence of the director. This is where the
agency originally started, before being moved to a church storefront on 05/07/02.
An office is set up in the basement of the residence. There is sufficient space,
equipment, and supplies to ensure the delivery of services. There is a door to the
room of the basement office so that interviews with clients are confidential. Clients
are also seen in community buildings and in the clients(cid:146) own homes.
B. Program Description
Adoptions Of The Heart, Inc. is a non-profit child-placing agency that facilitates
adoptions for children in need of permanent families. This includes, but is not limited
to evaluating families, educating families, matching children and families, legal
relinquishment services and/or adoption filing services, supervising placements,
maintaining support groups and offering counseling and support services. Adoption
services include both domestic and international adoptions.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
No violations were found. Compliance exists at this time with all applicable Child
Placing Rules.

I recommend issuance of an original provisional license to this child-placing agency,
